divs: Sighting DetailsDriving down the north east extension of the PA turnpike, going south, coming out of the tunnel, i was looking at the sky, I like star gazing, but it was kind of cloudy, on my left I look and see this swirling rainbow color object dancing around in the sky, going in crazy directions, just swirling around, , then it disappeared and then these small red round objects started darting around, coming together, then separating again, then seemed to form an outline of a triangle. I found the rainbow object to be quit beautiful, i wasn't afraid at all. I took a few pictures with my cell phone as i was driving, but couldn't keep taking my eyes off the road. They were still there as i drove past the area that they were in.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Slatington
There were no other sightings in Slatington on or around November 14th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Seen swirling object dancing around in the sky, had a rainbow color effect on it, then it was followed by round red glowing orb like objects.
